app.title: Hailuo AI: AI Video Generator
app.description:
Hailuo AI: Your AI Video Creation Companion
Transform your ideas into captivating videos with just a few clicks! Hailuo Video harnesses advanced AI technology to generate high-quality videos from text descriptions or images.
Key Features:
- Text-to-Video: Turn your written descriptions into vivid video content
- Image-to-Video: Convert still images into dynamic video scenes
- Subject Reference: Create videos with consistent character appearances across scenes
- Exceptional Emotional Expression: Generate videos with authentic and engaging character emotions
- Professional-Grade Quality: Create stunning visuals for social media and marketing content
Perfect for:
- Content Creators seeking efficient video production
- Social Media Enthusiasts wanting to stand out
- Marketers looking for quick, engaging video content
- Storytellers bringing their narratives to life
Experience the future of video creation with Hailuo Video. No editing skills required - let AI do magic!

Download now and start creating amazing videos in minutes!

reviews.text: free daily credits randomly stopped. I am unable to finish my projects, and I can't afford subscriptions. I liked this app. this was my go-to app, but now it is like other apps demanding expensive subscriptions. I am not surprised. I am very disappointed. It has been 3 weeks, and I still have not received my daily 100 points on the app. I enjoy the free points. But as of 3 weeks ago, the app randomly changed to subscriptions only without any warning. please fix it? i sent you an email. üòû

Excellent quality and service! I just started trying new AI video generators after seeing someone else's higher quality AI video that made me face facts about the reduced quality that I was getting with the other app I've been using. Hailuo Al gives excellent quality and results, some wait time but worth it. The only thing I'm a little down about is that there isn't a lip sync feature anywhere in the phone app. If they added the lip sync feature, I'd be really amazed. ‚ù§Ô∏è

This AI app is one of the best tool to generate text to image, image to video and text to video. the quality of the images and videos are excellent. I am overwhelmed with this app. Just a suggestion if you could add a checkbox or drop-down to understand the tool that images are created for one story and hence character face features and background of images need to be aligned and similar. I observed this issue while creating an animated story where every image gives a different baby face.

I've had a lot of fun making countless videos and pictures. with it. Sometimes, it can be annoying when it extends the wait time for non-members to try and get you to purchase. Still, you get quite a decent bit on the free tier. It's definitely a fun tool to stretch your imagination.

Hailuo AI is great. The app is good, and I recommend it for any Hailuo user. Still, I hope to see some additions to the app in the future: 1. Text to Image section 2. Better file searching capabilities Current ease of use is good. No serious issues or errors. Layout is functional and clean.

I'm not paying for this. the app keeps adding time to my queued video. I haven't yet had a successful video created by Hailuo. Until that happens, Hailuo won't have access to my monthly AI budget. Kling seems to be a much better choice.

I am an experienced AI video creator, and Hailuo AI is the best AI video generation tool I‚Äôve used. It‚Äôs very stable, easy to use, and the video effects are the most accurate in terms of the prompts. Highly recommended.

This app is worthy. AI video creators are relatively new. Most are limited to 10sec or less renders. This soft can carve out complex scenes with motion very easily. The subscription fee is lower than it's competitors. The only drawback is it doesn't render SFX, but the video quality is superior in my opinion. There aren't many good options in this field without paywalls.

I've been using Hailuo for months now, And i just love it so much, really!!! i know sometimes the prompt doesn't work, or the picture just does a weird close up... but not always, and compared to others, it's more accurate and fast! I keep recommending you guys to everyone i know, and we're having a blast!!! I'll consider to get a subscription one of this days! Thank You and never change please üôèüèª ü´∂üèª

Does the application keep the photos uploaded to it or share them with anyone because privacy is very important to me in the application, even if the developers themselves do not allow sharing the photos uploaded to it. Please respond as soon as possible.

app.AIReview:
Hailuo AI: AI Video Generator Review

Overview

Hailuo AI: AI Video Generator, developed by MiniMax, presents itself as an accessible entry point into automated video creation utilizing artificial intelligence. With over 1.29 million installs and a robust 4.198 rating from 16,116 users, the app demonstrates significant popularity within the photography category. The core premise ‚Äì transforming text or images into dynamic videos with minimal user effort ‚Äì aligns with current trends in content creation tools, particularly for individuals lacking extensive video editing skills or resources. The free-to-use model further lowers the barrier to entry, making it appealing to a broad audience including hobbyists, small business owners, and social media influencers seeking rapid content generation. The app‚Äôs tagline, ‚ÄúWhere ideas meet cinema,‚Äù aims to convey its potential for creating surprisingly professional-looking videos.

Key Features

Hailuo AI boasts several key features designed to streamline the video creation process:

  • Text-to-Video: This is the flagship feature, allowing users to input a textual description and have the app generate a corresponding video. The level of detail in the text prompt appears to directly influence the quality and complexity of the resulting video; longer, more descriptive prompts are expected to yield better results.
  • Image-to-Video: Users can upload still images and instruct the AI to transform them into dynamic scenes with movement, transitions, and potentially even subtle animations. This is particularly useful for repurposing marketing materials or creating short social media clips.
  • Subject Reference: A notable feature allowing users to establish a 'consistent character' across multiple video scenes ‚Äì crucial for narrative-driven content or scenarios involving recurring subjects. The app appears to utilize AI models trained on facial recognition and consistency, aiming to maintain the same appearance of the subject throughout different shots and environments.
  • AI Scene Generation: Beyond simply animating existing images or text, Hailuo AI incorporates an AI engine that generates entire scenes from scratch based on user prompts. This suggests a level of creative autonomy beyond simple transformation.
  • Customizable Styles & Templates: Offers pre-designed templates categorized by genre (e.g., cinematic, vlog, marketing) and allows users to adjust parameters like speed, transitions, music, and visual effects for added control.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: The app‚Äôs interface is remarkably intuitive. The core functionality ‚Äì text-to-video and image-to-video ‚Äì is accessible with just a few taps, making it genuinely user-friendly even for those unfamiliar with video editing software.
  • Rapid Content Creation: The speed at which Hailuo AI generates videos is impressive. Compared to traditional video editing workflows, the time savings are substantial, allowing users to quickly prototype ideas or create content on demand. The estimated generation times (detailed within the app) suggest a relatively efficient backend processing system.
  • Accessibility: Being free to use dramatically lowers the risk for experimentation and allows anyone with an idea to explore AI-powered video creation without financial commitment.
  • Creative Potential: The combination of text prompts, image uploads, and subject references opens up significant creative possibilities. Users can experiment with different scenarios, styles, and narratives.

Areas for Improvement

  • Video Quality Variance: While the app generates videos relatively quickly, the quality is inconsistent. Some generated videos appear polished and professional, while others suffer from noticeable AI artifacts, unnatural movements, or awkward transitions. This variability requires users to spend considerable time refining outputs ‚Äì a counterproductive step given the core promise of ease-of-use.
  • Prompt Sensitivity: The app‚Äôs responsiveness to prompt detail needs refinement. Vague prompts often result in generic or uninspired videos. Users need clearer guidance on crafting effective prompts for optimal results. More detailed tutorials and examples would be beneficial.
  • Limited Control: Despite the customizable styles, users have limited control over granular aspects of video generation ‚Äì such as precise frame-by-frame adjustments or fine-tuning animation parameters. A more advanced mode with greater manual controls could significantly enhance creative possibilities for experienced users.
  • Music Integration: The current music library is quite basic and doesn‚Äôt offer much variety. Seamless integration with external music streaming services would be a significant improvement.

User Experience

The user experience within Hailuo AI is generally positive, primarily due to its simplicity and speed. The app's clean interface minimizes distractions, focusing the user on prompt input and video preview. Navigation is intuitive, making it easy to explore different features and settings. However, the inconsistent video quality can disrupt the overall user experience, leading to frustration when desired results aren‚Äôt achieved. The lack of real-time feedback during generation (e.g., a progress bar with estimated completion time) could also be improved.

Value for Money

As a free app, Hailuo AI offers exceptional value for casual users and beginners exploring the possibilities of AI video creation. The core functionality ‚Äì text-to-video and image-to-video ‚Äì is surprisingly effective, providing a taste of what‚Äôs possible with this technology. However, if users require consistently high-quality videos or advanced control features, they may eventually find themselves tempted to explore premium options offered by competitors (if any exist).

Conclusion

Hailuo AI: AI Video Generator represents an exciting step forward in accessible video creation tools. Its ease of use and rapid content generation capabilities make it a compelling option for anyone looking to quickly transform ideas into engaging videos. While inconsistencies in video quality and limited control represent areas needing improvement, the app‚Äôs popularity and free price tag suggest its potential. MiniMax should prioritize refining the AI engine to improve video quality and expand user controls. Overall, Hailuo AI is a promising tool that deserves a try, particularly for those venturing into the world of AI-powered creative content generation. It's a solid 3.8 out of 5 ‚Äì with the potential to reach a higher rating as the underlying technology matures.
